ctx: intros A B R S f Hf Hex l Hg.
induction Hg as [a l' eH | a l' gHg IHg].
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Set R : Rel A S : Rel B f : A -> B Hf : forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b) Hex : forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a} a : list A l' : GoodR A R a Unable to unify "GoodR ?M1483 ?M1484 (?M1485 :: ?M1486)" with "Bar B (GoodR B S) (map f a)".

ctx: intros A B R S f Hf Hex l Hg.
induction Hg as [a l' eH | a l' gHg IHg].
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) A, B : Set R : Rel A S : Rel B f : A -> B Hf : forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b) Hex : forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a} a : list A l' : GoodR A R a Unable to unify "ExistsL B ?M5140 (map f ?M5143)" with "Bar B (GoodR B S) (map f a)".

ctx: intros A B R S f Hf Hex l Hg.
induction Hg as [a l' eH | a l' gHg IHg].
intros A B R S f Hf Hex l Hg.
induction Hg as [a l' eH | a l' gHg IHg].
exceptions.exn: In environment X1 : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) X0 : forall (A B : Set) (P : Pred A) (S : Pred B) (f : A -> B), (forall a : A, P a -> S (f a)) -> forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL B S (map f l) X : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) A, B : Set R : Rel A S : Rel B f : A -> B Hf : forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b) Hex : forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a} a : list A l' : GoodR A R a Unable to unify "S (f ?M11083) (f ?M11084)" with "Bar B (GoodR B S) (map f a)".

exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Set R : Rel A S : Rel B f : A -> B Hf : forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b) Hex : forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a} a : list A l' : forall a0 : A, Bar A (GoodR A R) (a0 :: a) gHg : forall a0 : A, GRBar B S (map f (a0 :: a)) Unable to unify "GoodR ?M19425 ?M19426 (?M19427 :: ?M19428)" with "Bar B (GoodR B S) (map f a)".

original: intros A B R S f Hf Hex l Hg. induction Hg as [a l' eH | a l' gHg IHg]. - simpl. apply FoundG. apply subPredExistsL with (f := f). intros x H. apply Hf. apply H. apply eH. - simpl. apply SearchG. apply IHg.
